div.div: Ripon College vs. Lake Forest College
at Lake Forest, Ill. | Farwell Field

tr.td: Ripon wins the coin toss and will receive and defend west end zone.
D. Campagna kickoff 70 yards to the RC0, touchback.
T.J. Pierce rush for 12 yards to the RC32, 1ST DOWN RC (D. Campagna).
Michael Crusan rush for 3 yards to the RC35 (Luke Butts).
Matt Miller pass complete to Ben Garland for 11 yards to the RC46, 1ST DOWN RC (Joe Stella).
